SEARCH
Package com.bws.jdistil.core.servlet

Class Loader

java.lang.Object
com.bws.jdistil.core.servlet.Loader
public class Loader extends Object
This class provides static methods used to load objects with data contained in a servlet request.
Author:
- Bryan Snipes

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
    private
    Loader()
    Creates a new instance of the ParameterExtractor class.  Defined with private access to prohibit instance creation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static int
    getInstanceCount(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request, Object object)
    Returns an instance count for a given object.

    Returns a field value using a request, field, and instance number.

    load(ISecurityManager securityManager, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, Action action, Object object)
    Loads data into an instance of this class using the first instance of data contained in a given HTTP servlet request.
    static void

  • Constructor Details

    • Loader

      private Loader()
      Creates a new instance of the ParameterExtractor class.  Defined with private access to prohibit instance creation.

  • Method Details

    • getInstanceCount

      public static int getInstanceCount(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request, Object object)
      Returns an instance count for a given object. Instance numbers are appended as a suffix to the field ID.
      Parameters:
      request - - Servlet request object.
      object - - Target object.
      Returns:
      int - Instance count.

    • load

      public static void load(ISecurityManager securityManager, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, Action action, Object object) throws ServletException
      Loads data into an instance of this class using the first instance of data contained in a given HTTP servlet request. Security manager is used to avoid loading hidden and read only field values.
      Parameters:
      securityManager - - Security manager.
      request - - HTTP servlet request.
      action - - Submitted action.
      object - - Object to load.
      Throws:
      ServletException

    • load

      public static void load(ISecurityManager securityManager, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, Action action, Object object, int instance) throws ServletException
      Loads page specific data into an instance of this class using data contained in a given HTTP servlet request. Security manager is used to avoid loading hidden and read only field values.
      Parameters:
      securityManager - - Security manager.
      request - - HTTP servlet request.
      action - - Submitted action.
      object - - Object to load.
      instance - - Instance number.
      Throws:
      ServletException

    • getValue

      private static Object getValue(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, Object object, Field field, FieldBinding fieldBinding, int instance)
      Returns a field value using a request, field, and instance number.
      Parameters:
      request - - HTTP servlet request.
      object - - Target object.
      field - - Field.
      fieldBinding - - Field binding.
      instance - - Instance number.
      Returns:
      Object - Field value.

    • getValues

      private static Object getValues(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, Object object, Field field, FieldBinding fieldBinding, int instance)
      Returns a list of field values using a request, field, and instance number.
      Parameters:
      request - - HTTP servlet request.
      object - - Target object.
      field - - Field.
      fieldBinding - - Field binding.
      instance - - Instance number.
      Returns:
      List - List of field values.
